sentence: The answer to that question is that yes, some right-wing Republicans are willing to aggressively stand up for democracy in the U.S. House of Representatives, for example, Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Rep. Adam Kinzinger of Illinois have been blistering critics of the Big Lie.
author: Alex Henderson
title: A Las Vegas paper just published a stunning editorial: 'We are struggling to identify' Republicans 'who are not an active threat' to democracy
